AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on can be used to start Application/Desktop of 2X Client.
AddOnInfo.ChangeHistory: 06-11-2014 Upgrade to Framework 4.0 26-03-2015 Minor UI and bug fixes 12-05-2017 Added show command line option. 25-05-2017 Fixed small issue with show command line option
AddOnInfo.Name: 2X Client Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on can start an Ammyy session with a predefined host or put Ammyy in waiting state as a client.
AddOnInfo.Name: Ammyy Admin Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This add-on allows you to connect to a specific AnyDesk remote desktop.
AddOnInfo.ChangeHistory: 09-29-2014 Initial release 02-18-2016 Added support for sending password. 03-06-2017 Adding executable override path
AddOnInfo.Name: AnyDesk Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on can be used to let connect your Anyplace Control sessions. (Only “connection via ID” method is supported)
AddOnInfo.Name: Anyplace Control Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on can be used to configure and start AT&T Global Network Client sessions.
AddOnInfo.Name: AT&T Global Network Client Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on allow you to start a AWRC Pro (Atelier Web Remote Commander Professsional) session with specific host, user name and password. Remote Commander allows you to remotely gather and manipulate more information than remote privileged users usually can.
AddOnInfo.Name: Atelier Wed AWRC Pro Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Shawn Beckwith and Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: Avaya (Nortel) VPN Add-on for Remote Desktop Manager adds the ability to use a Avaya (Nortel) VPN.
AddOnInfo.Name: Avaya (Nortel) VPN Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This add-on can start a AxelViewer session for a specific host with its settings.
AddOnInfo.ChangeHistory: 02/19/2014 Initial release 03/04/2014 Fixed bad url for download 06-11-2014 Upgrade to Framework 4.0
AddOnInfo.Name: AxelViewer Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on can be used to open Barracuda NG Firewall session with the application.
AddOnInfo.ChangeHistory: 07-16-2014 Initial release 01-09-2015 Global settings for executable name override
AddOnInfo.Name: Barracuda NG Firewall Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on can be used to connect to your Barracuda NG Network VPN sessions.
AddOnInfo.ChangeHistory: 06-11-2014 Upgrade to Framework 4.0 05-20-2015 Updated default path and executable name
AddOnInfo.Name: Barracuda NG Network VPN Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on enable you to start automatically a Bitvise SSH client session. There are 3 ways to create a session: - By inputting Host, port, user name and password. - By inputting the name of a Bitvise SSH client profile file (.bscp). - By storing a Bitvise SSH client profile file data in the session setting.
AddOnInfo.Name: Bitvise SSH Client Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on can be used to connect to your Bitvise Tunnelier VPN sessions.
AddOnInfo.Name: Bitvise Tunnelier VPN Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: With this Add-on you will be able to define a session that will can automaticaly: - Login - Start a session with a search string (host/description) - Start a script from disk - Save a script within the session data to be able to start it on another workstation.
AddOnInfo.Name: Bomgar Representative Console Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on import the configuration from Boztech VNCScan.
AddOnInfo.Name: Boztech VNCScan Import Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on can be used to connect to your Check Point Endpoint Security VPN sessions.
AddOnInfo.ChangeHistory: 06-11-2014 Upgrade to Framework 4.0 05-29-2015 Default path change. 03-21-2017 Fixed issue with the P12 certificate
AddOnInfo.Name: Check Point Endpoint Security Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This add-on is used to open Check Point's SmartDashboard, SmartEvents and DatabaseTool programs using the specified credentials.
AddOnInfo.Name: Check Point Smart Console Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on can be used to connect to yourCheck Point VPN-1 SecureClient sessions.
AddOnInfo.Name: Check Point VPN-1 SecureClient Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions & Michel van Duijn
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on can be used to connect to your Cisco AnyConnect VPN sessions.
AddOnInfo.ChangeHistory: 05-29-2014 Added Auto-Login 06-11-2014 Upgrade to Framework 4.0 06-23-2014 Added "Connect anyway" confirmation 07-03-2014 Fix on automatic authentication 07-16-2014 Fix on already running app kill 08-04-2014 Fixed special characters support and "HasExited" method enhanced. 08-20-2014 Auto fill method changed 09-29-2014 Put back property UseOldCommandLineLayout for compatibility issue 10-14-2014 Added group number feature 10-28-2014 Changed order sequence of group number feature 11-18-2014 New delay for auto fill credential 12-03-2014 New legacy kill method 02-24-2015 Added Digital certificate answer option 02-26-2015 Added a new step to Digital certificate answer option 04-28-2015 Fix for possible issue with the username and password 05-04-2015 Added a new option for digital certificate answer 06-01-2015 "Connect anyway" can now be used both before and after the connection. 06-08-2015 Added a new advanced option for the "connect anyway" window. 07-27-2015 Fixed a timing issue and parameter sending issue. 10-02-2015 Bug fix with the process. 10-19-2015 Bug fix with the comboboxes. 01-11-2016 Fixed possible issue with the focus. 01-25-2016 Fixed issue with the focus. 01-26-2016 Added support for domain. 04-11-2017 Added "second password" settings 04-13-2017 Improved "second password" with SMS
AddOnInfo.Name: Cisco AnyConnect VPN Client Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on can launch the Cisco ASDM (a java appliance that manages Cisco ASA). The Cisco ASDM can be locally installed or accessed from the host. You have to provide the host and its credential.
AddOnInfo.ChangeHistory: 06-11-2014 Upgrade to Framework 4.0 07-31-2014 Upgrade to Framework 4.0 Added special characters support for password 10-01-2014 Added copy to clipboard credentials feature 08-26-2015 Added accept certificate before login feature 12-24-2015 Added disable special character handling for password feature 09-21-2016 Fixed possible issue with the special character handling. 04-25-2017 Improved the window handling
AddOnInfo.Name: Cisco ASDM Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on can be used to open Citrix NetScaler session with the application.
AddOnInfo.ChangeHistory: 08-20-2014 Initial release 05-10-2016 Added autofilling for the passcode 07-21-2016 New option for auto-submit and prompt for passcode added
AddOnInfo.Name: Citrix NetScaler Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on is to start a Database .Net session with a predefined connection settings.
AddOnInfo.Name: Database .Net Session Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This add-on can start a DbVisualizer session with advanced settings. Support auto edit script and credential repositories.
AddOnInfo.Name: DbVisualizer Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: With this Add-on you can configure any Ericom Blaze Client session that you are already using. It will permit you to start automatically your session in a single double-click. It is compatible with any credentials repository integrated in RDM.
AddOnInfo.Name: Ericom Blaze Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on can be used to connect to your F5 FirePass SSL VPN sessions.
AddOnInfo.Name: F5 FirePass SSL VPN Client Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This add-on allows you to connect to a remote host using the specified credentials through FastClient and FastMaster.
AddOnInfo.ChangeHistory: 02-05-2016 Initial release 02-08-2016 Added new connect option
AddOnInfo.Name: FastViewer Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on can be used to connect to your FEC Secure IPSec Client VPN sessions.
AddOnInfo.Name: FEC Secure IPSec Client Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on import the locally configured Filezilla sessions.
AddOnInfo.ChangeHistory: 06-11-2014 Upgrade to Framework 4.0 05-25-2016 Improvements for the password import as well as the protocol import 08-02-2016 Fixed possible crash issues
AddOnInfo.Name: Filezilla Import Add-on

AddOnInfo.Name: FlashFXP Session Tool Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on can be used to connect to your FortiClient VPN sessions or FortiClient SSL VPN session.
AddOnInfo.ChangeHistory: 06-11-2014 Upgrade to Framework 4.0 07-03-2014 Fix on VPN close 03-11-2016 Fixed possible issue with the disconnect 02-02-2017 Added option to open the VPN as hidden or not 01-03-2017 Added support for username and password when using ipsec.exe Added new close method: taskkill 14-03-2017 Fixed possible issue with the taskkill close method 15-03-2017 Added support for executable override 21-03-2017 Fixed issue with copy credentials Fixed possible issue with executable override 10-04-2017 Added ignore certificate option for FortiSSLVPNClient.exe 10-07-2017 Fixed possible issue with executable override
AddOnInfo.Name: FortiClient VPN/SSL Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This add-on is used to connect to a GateProtect firewall using the GateProtect Administration Client.
AddOnInfo.ChangeHistory: 12-10-2014 Initial Release 05-05-2015 Support for version 9.0 executable added.
AddOnInfo.Name: GateProtect Firewall Administration Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This generic VPN session is designed to fit the needs of most of existing VPN. You simply have to know the executable name and the opening and closing arguments.
AddOnInfo.Name: Generic VPN Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions

AddOnInfo.Name: HeidiSQL Add-on

AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on allows to use, configure and store IBM Personnal Communications session. The terminal can run external or embedded in RDM. Session settings can be centralized in your database.

AddOnInfo.Description: Support for Microsoft Telnet client.

AddOnInfo.Author: Jason Skuby & Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: MySQL GUI Tools Add-on allows you to add sessions for MySQL Administrator, MySQL Query Browser or both into Remote Desktop Manager. Even though the MySQL GUI Tools has been recently replaced with MySQL Workbench, the GUI Tools are still widely deployed and used.
AddOnInfo.ChangeHistory: 06-23-2014 Added View password button, Credential repository support, Upgrade to Framework 4.0
AddOnInfo.Name: MySQL Tools Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on can be used to start MySQLWorkbench. You can specify the name of an Instance to administer, the name of a Connection to query or the name of a Model file to open.
AddOnInfo.ChangeHistory:
06-11-2014 Upgrade to Framework 4.0
03-30-2017 Adding command line
AddOnInfo.Name: MySQL Workbench Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on can be used to start MySQLWorkbench. You can specify the name of an Instance to administer, the name of a Connection to query or the name of a Model file to open.
AddOnInfo.ChangeHistory:
06-11-2014 Upgrade to Framework 4.0
03-30-2017 Adding new command line.

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This add-on supports all command line options of Navicat Premium that is a multi-connections database administration tool allowing you to connect to MySQL, SQL Server, SQLite, Oracle and PostgreSQL databases simultaneously within a single application.
AddOnInfo.Name: Navicat Premium Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on can be used to connect to your NCP Secure Entry Client VPN sessions.

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on can be used to start Netop secure remote control.

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on enable you to create sessions to deal with many commonly-used tasks. You can, for example, use different control profiles, set-up a connection to specific clients or automatically execute a commands when required.
AddOnInfo.ChangeHistory: 02/06/2014 - Added option to show command that is about to be sent to the NetSupport Manager 06-11-2014 Upgrade to Framework 4.0
AddOnInfo.Name: NetSupport Manager Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: NoMachine Add-on adds the ability to use existing NoMachine (NxPlayer) sessions or store a session in RDM for use on any machine with NoMachine installed.
AddOnInfo.ChangeHistory: 06-11-2014 Upgrade to Framework 4.0 07-13-2016 Support for sending the username when using the "stored in profile" start up type.
AddOnInfo.Name: NoMachine Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Jason Skuby & Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: NX Client Add-on for Remote Desktop Manager adds the ability to use existing NX Client sessions or store a session in RDM for use on any machine with NX Client installed.
AddOnInfo.Name: NX Client Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Jason Skuby and Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: OpenVPN Add-on for Remote Desktop Manager adds the ability to store and use OpenVPN client configurations in Remote Desktop Manager. It allows you to create or import/export OpenVPN configurations (including certificate and key files) and the ability to store user/password and key credentials and automatically load them into the OpenVPN GUI prompts.
AddOnInfo.ChangeHistory: 05-29-2014 Added Italian Login dialog detection 06-11-2014 Upgrade to Framework 4.0 07-23-2014 Added Credential repository support Added Login window detection with specified name 11-06-2014 Fixed: Unable to fill login window name if credential repository used. 04-30-2015 Fixed: Login window detection 02-15-2016 Fixed possible issue with saving. 01-11-2016 Fixed possible issue with OpenVPN 2.4 05-02-2017 Fixed possible crash in rare cases
AddOnInfo.Name: OpenVPN Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This add-on can start a PenguiNet SSH session with predefined profile or advanced parameters. It also supports Secure CoPy session (SCP).
AddOnInfo.Name: PenguiNet SSH Client Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This add-on can be used to start PgAdmin III sessions. Currently supported modes: -autoconnect to server -query builder -server status connection
AddOnInfo.Name: PgAdmin III Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: Allow direct access to Keepass database.

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on can be used to start PowerTermPro session or script

AddOnInfo.Author: Sjoerd van den Berg (Azabi)
AddOnInfo.Description:
This Add-on adds the ability to use existing Proxy sessions or store a session in RDM for use on any machine with Proxy Master installed.
New since Version 2.0.0.6 - Password reveal textbox - Dropdownlist improvement - Password Analyzer compatible - View Password compatible
AddOnInfo.Name: Proxy Networks - Proxy Master Session Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on allows the management of Remote Utilities - Viewer connections.
AddOnInfo.ChangeHistory: 06-11-2014 Upgrade to Framework 4.0 11-18-2015 Added an option to override the address book path.
AddOnInfo.Name: Remote Utilities - Viewer Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This add-on is used to initiate a session with RemoteAssistant365.
AddOnInfo.Name: RemoteAssistant365 Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This add-on is used to start an already existing Royal TS connection or an Ad Hoc connection.
AddOnInfo.Name: Royal TS Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on allows you to use RVTools to display information about your virtual machines.
AddOnInfo.ChangeHistory: 09-23-2014 Initial release 03-05-2015 Bug fixes and enhancements 03-11-2015 Bug fixes
AddOnInfo.Name: RVTools Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This add-on allows you to execute a command with Sandboxie to start a sandboxed application to the specified sandbox.
AddOnInfo.Name: Sandboxie Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Olaf Kionka (trianet GmbH) and Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Sesssion Add-on can start sessions selected from your saplogon.ini files located anywhere on your PC client. (e.g. if you work for more then one customer) + possiblility to copy/create saplogon.ini independent sessions. If you're working in a not editable saplogon.ini environment (or daily refreshed due GroupPolicies from your Client-Team) + also the feature to automatic logon and execute Transaction/Reports if you wish. + Supports for Secure Network Connect (SNC) + connections over saprouter(s), handles Loadbalancing (Logongroups), ... Requirements: installed SAP GUI on Client Limitations: only external Sessions are possible.
AddOnInfo.ChangeHistory: 02/14/2014 -fixed NullReferenceException 04/09/2014 -Fixed Login language support 06-11-2014 Upgrade to Framework 4.0 07-23-2014 Added Environment variable support 05-11-2017 Added show command line option
AddOnInfo.LastVersionDescription: Session selection in combo box, identification of saplogon.ini changes, case sensitive ini-parser, tested SNC sessions, default Logon Language handling, ...
AddOnInfo.Name: SAP Gui Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Olaf Kionka (trianet GmbH) and Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: The Import Add-on can import a bunch of sessions from a saplogon.ini. This Add-on is currently bundled in "SAP GUI Session Add-on".dll-file. + can also create Sessions for OS Access to: Unix uses Putty [telnet /ssh] with root/ <sid>adm / ora<sid> / userdefinde Accounts Windows RDP with administrator / <sid>adm / userdefined Accounts Access to the SAP Management Console of the SAP Host Agents (details see SAP Note 1014480) Can also create sessions for Web Access to J2EE Instances of the importing sessions. Link support for Administration (NW Administrator, UME, J2ee Telnet Console), SAP PI ( DIR, RWB, REP, SR) and other applications ...
AddOnInfo.Name: SAP Gui Import Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Olaf Kionka (trianet GmbH) and Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Session Tool Add-on uses SAPNiPing on Sessions, to evaluate the correct Hostnames/Servicenames. (Check in Switch over Clusterenvironments).
AddOnInfo.Name: SAP Gui Session Tool Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This add-on allows you to start the SAP Hana Studio application while specifying a host, username, instance name and workspace.
AddOnInfo.Name: SAP Hana Studio

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on allows you to connect, manage and monitor any SAP MaxDB database of version 7.5 and higher.

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This add-on is used to connect to a desktop instance of SAP NetWeaver with the provided credentials.

AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on can be used to connect to your WatchGuard Mobile VPN sessions.
AddOnInfo.Name: WatchGuard Mobile VPN Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Sjoerd van den Berg (Azabi)
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on can be used to connect to your Watchguard SSL VPN sessions. It will change the host and username in the registry, then start the client. It cannot automatically connect since the password cannot be set. You have to manually type this in.
AddOnInfo.Name: Watchguard SSL VPN Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This add-on allows you to add a specified TakeMote host and connect to it using the Wezarp Client.
AddOnInfo.Name: Wezarp Client Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on can be used to query the Who Is information for a web site.
AddOnInfo.ChangeHistory:
06-11-2014 Upgrade to Framework 4.0
15-02-2017 Fix possible issues with WhoIs and adding domain database use.
AddOnInfo.Name: Who is Application Tool Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on can be used to query the Who Is information for a web site.
AddOnInfo.ChangeHistory:
06-11-2014 Upgrade to Framework 4.0
15-02-2017 Fix possible issues with WhoIs and adding domain database use.
AddOnInfo.Name: Who Is Session Tool Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: Winbox is a small utility that allows administration of Mikrotik RouterOS using a fast and simple GUI. This Add-on enable to start Winbox with predefined settings (host, username, password).
AddOnInfo.ChangeHistory: 06-11-2014 Upgrade to Framework 4.0 10-20-2014 Added Embedded mode support 10-28-2014 Extended timeout for embedded frame creation 10-24-2016 Added executable override. 03-06-2017 Fixed issue override executable path
AddOnInfo.Name: Winbox for Mikrotik Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on import the configuration from WinSCP.
AddOnInfo.Name: WinSCP Import Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This add-on is used to connect to an X2Go host by specifying a connection saved in the X2Go client and a username and password pair.
AddOnInfo.Name: X2Go Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Jean-Pierre Boyer
AddOnInfo.Description: XMail Admin Add-on is an Add-on to remote manage Xmail (http://www.xmailserver.org/) by Davide Libenzy. At this time the features are : Add / Remove domains Add / Remove Users Change User Pass Change User Informations Add / Remove Users aliases.
AddOnInfo.Name: XMail Admin Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on can be used to open a XDMCP, XStart, XShell or XFtp session using XManager.
AddOnInfo.Name: XManager Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on can be used to open Xshell session with the application.
AddOnInfo.Name: Xshell Add-on

AddOnInfo.Author: Devolutions
AddOnInfo.Description: This Add-on allows the management of ZOC host sessions. Supports /CALL:<host name> command line parameter Supports only external Sessions.
AddOnInfo.Name: ZOC Add-on
